title: Reassessing Quirinius and the Census of Luke 2
summary: Analyzes inscriptional evidence suggesting an earlier administrative role for Quirinius in Syria.
source: Journal of Ancient Near Eastern Studies

title: Bethlehem in the Second Temple Period
summary: Synthesizes archaeological surveys around Bethlehem with emphasis on Herodian expansions.

title: The Logos Hymn and Second Temple Wisdom Traditions
summary: Connects John 1 to Jewish sapiential texts with attention to textual transmission.
source: Journal for the Study of the New Testament
